entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH ENDED, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain or drizzle early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
